member.name: T:Anzu.AnzuStats
member.summary: Displays statistics related to the ad's placement.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.GUIDepth
member.summary: The sorting depth of the currently executing GUI behaviour.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.FontSize
member.summary: Specifies the size of the widget and the text displayed in the interface.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.BackgroundAlpha
member.summary: Specifies the opacity of the stats background.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowType
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the placement type.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowState
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the placement state.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowAngle
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the placement angle.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowVisibility
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the placement visibility score percentage.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowViewability
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the placement viewability score percentage.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowImpressions
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the channel impression count.

member.name: F:Anzu.AnzuStats.ShowEmpties
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility of the channel empty event count.

member.name: T:Anzu.AnzuSDK
member.summary: Synchronizes the Anzu SDK with Unity's execution order. This component is mandatory for the SDK to function correctly.

member.name: P:Anzu.AnzuSDK.Instance
member.summary: Static instance of the AnzuUnity component.
